product_description: A warm-weather standby for the office, this belted shirtdress with rollable sleeves is cut from a stretch-woven fabric with a cool, linen-like feel.
product_details_and_care:
A warm-weather standby for the office, this belted shirtdress with rollable sleeves is cut from a stretch-woven fabric with a cool, linen-like feel.
Button half-placket
Spread collar
Long sleeves with two-button cuffs
Chest patch pocket
Removable belt
Shirttail hem
54% polyester, 42% viscose, 4% elastane
Machine wash, line dry
Imported
Point of View
Item #5987391
product_size_info:
If between sizes; order one size down.
XXS=00, XS=0-2, S=4-6, M=8-10, L=12-14, XL=16-18 (14W).
